attributes.action: The government must follow the request of the 17.4 million people who voted OUT
attributes.additional_details: The electorate are fed up with seeing people in power not fulfilling their wishes, this is why the EU has failed.  Let's be a dynamic country who moves quickly to adapt to changes and challenges around the world without having to have 28 countries agree to what is in the best interests of us as a country.
attributes.background: The nation was given a choice on June 23rd 2016 on their continued membership of the EU.  The country made it's decision, members of parliament must now follow through with the wishes of the majority they need to stop arguing and work towards setting up new trade deals to ensure confidence remains.
